name: sio

variants.name: builtin_zlib
variants.description: Use and statically link against a builtin version of zlib

variants.name: cxxstd
variants.description: Use the specified C++ standard when building.

description:
SIO is a persistency solution for reading and writing binary data in SIO
structures called record and block. SIO has originally been implemented
as persistency layer for LCIO.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependent_to.name: lcio
dependent_to.description: HEP Library for Linear Collider Input/Output

dependent_to.name: podio
dependent_to.description:
PODIO, or plain-old-data I/O, is a C++ library to support the creation
and handling of data models in particle physics.
